pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graph Theoretic Randomness Tests // A collection of functions for testing randomness (or mutual independence) in linear and circular data as proposed in Gehlot and Laha (2025a) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2506.21157 and Gehlot and Laha (2025b) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2506.23522, respectively.
